text: Lawrence Charles Weiner (February 10, 1942 - December 2, 2021) was an American conceptual artist. He was an important person in the creation of conceptual art in the 1960s. His works were usually a form of word art. Weiner died on December 2, 2021, in New York City from prostate cancer at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Artists from New York City Category:Cancer deaths in New York City
title: Lawrence Weiner
